title: Gold Coast Beachfront Apartment Escape on Currumbin Beach with Onsite Pool
description:
Enjoy coastal serenity at this beachfront beauty, perfectly positioned on the Gold Coast's pristine Currumbin Beach. This magical haven is just steps from azure waters and golden sands. Laze in sophisticated apartments offering views of the deep blue and devour Italian fare at the nearby Tommy's Italian or try a healthy acai bowl at The Salt Mill.

Dive into the refreshing pool and let the kids loose in the onsite games room while you enjoy a game of tennis or a relaxing spa. Explore all you want with the stunning Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary and Currumbin Creek a short distance away. For the adventurous, try your hand at surfing or simply soak up the vibrant local art scene.
